hyp_text: The USA Gymnastics Association supports an independent investigation, which could shed light on why the survivor of Larry Nassar's sexual abuse, who bravely reported it, had his crimes ignored for a long time, and the association also welcomes any necessary and appropriate changes.

[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Yue Chinese]: 幾個世紀以來，人們在崎嶇陡峭的地形上精心建造梯田，其一直延伸到俯瞰大海的懸崖。
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Yue Chinese]: 在阿拉斯加費爾班克斯以南洩漏數千桶原油後，800 英里長的阿拉斯加輸油管道系統被逼關閉。
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Yue Chinese]: 今天的比利時的部分國土在過去曾是盧森堡的一部分，但在1830年代的比利時革命後成為比利時的一部分。

[Yue Chinese]: 自創辦以來，《洋蔥報》已經成為一個名副其實的新聞模仿帝國，擁有印刷版、10 月份吸引了 500 萬獨立訪問者的網站、個人廣告、24 小時新聞網絡、博客，以及最近推出名為《我們的愚蠢世界》的世界地圖集。

hyp_text: Water was overflowing from a part of the dam, reaching a width of 100 feet.
prompt:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are an accurate translator. You MUST answer with the following JSON scheme: {"translation": string}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

[Yue Chinese]: 雖然如此，但所有使用法語的比利時人和瑞士人在學校都學過標準法語，因此他們亦能理解標準法語的數字系統。
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Yue Chinese]: 幾個世紀以來，人們在崎嶇陡峭的地形上精心建造梯田，其一直延伸到俯瞰大海的懸崖。
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Yue Chinese]: 在阿拉斯加費爾班克斯以南洩漏數千桶原油後，800 英里長的阿拉斯加輸油管道系統被逼關閉。
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Yue Chinese]: 今天的比利時的部分國土在過去曾是盧森堡的一部分，但在1830年代的比利時革命後成為比利時的一部分。
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Yue Chinese]: 自創辦以來，《洋蔥報》已經成為一個名副其實的新聞模仿帝國，擁有印刷版、10 月份吸引了 500 萬獨立訪問者的網站、個人廣告、24 小時新聞網絡、博客，以及最近推出名為《我們的愚蠢世界》的世界地圖集。

hyp_text: Among the 1,400 respondents interviewed before the 2010 federal election, the number of those opposed to Australia becoming a republic increased by 8% compared to 2008.
prompt:

[Yue Chinese]: 雖然如此，但所有使用法語的比利時人和瑞士人在學校都學過標準法語，因此他們亦能理解標準法語的數字系統。
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Yue Chinese]: 幾個世紀以來，人們在崎嶇陡峭的地形上精心建造梯田，其一直延伸到俯瞰大海的懸崖。
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Yue Chinese]: 在阿拉斯加費爾班克斯以南洩漏數千桶原油後，800 英里長的阿拉斯加輸油管道系統被逼關閉。
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Yue Chinese]: 今天的比利時的部分國土在過去曾是盧森堡的一部分，但在1830年代的比利時革命後成為比利時的一部分。
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Yue Chinese]: 自創辦以來，《洋蔥報》已經成為一個名副其實的新聞模仿帝國，擁有印刷版、10 月份吸引了 500 萬獨立訪問者的網站、個人廣告、24 小時新聞網絡、博客，以及最近推出名為《我們的愚蠢世界》的世界地圖集。

hyp_text: Everyone will participate in social activities and use the transportation system, and almost everyone complains about the transportation system.

[Yue Chinese]: 雖然如此，但所有使用法語的比利時人和瑞士人在學校都學過標準法語，因此他們亦能理解標準法語的數字系統。
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Yue Chinese]: 幾個世紀以來，人們在崎嶇陡峭的地形上精心建造梯田，其一直延伸到俯瞰大海的懸崖。
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Yue Chinese]: 在阿拉斯加費爾班克斯以南洩漏數千桶原油後，800 英里長的阿拉斯加輸油管道系統被逼關閉。
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Yue Chinese]: 今天的比利時的部分國土在過去曾是盧森堡的一部分，但在1830年代的比利時革命後成為比利時的一部分。
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Yue Chinese]: 自創辦以來，《洋蔥報》已經成為一個名副其實的新聞模仿帝國，擁有印刷版、10 月份吸引了 500 萬獨立訪問者的網站、個人廣告、24 小時新聞網絡、博客，以及最近推出名為《我們的愚蠢世界》的世界地圖集。

src_text: 昆蟲是最早在天空飛翔的動物。牠們的飛行能力幫助牠們更輕鬆地躲避敵人，同時更有效尋找食物和配偶。
ref_text: Insects were the first animals to take to the air. Their ability to fly helped them evade enemies more easily and find food and mates more efficiently.
hyp_text: Insects are the earliest animals to have flown in the sky. Their flight ability helps them evade predators more easily, while also making it more effective to find food and a mate.

[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Yue Chinese]: 雖然如此，但所有使用法語的比利時人和瑞士人在學校都學過標準法語，因此他們亦能理解標準法語的數字系統。
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Yue Chinese]: 幾個世紀以來，人們在崎嶇陡峭的地形上精心建造梯田，其一直延伸到俯瞰大海的懸崖。
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Yue Chinese]: 在阿拉斯加費爾班克斯以南洩漏數千桶原油後，800 英里長的阿拉斯加輸油管道系統被逼關閉。
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Yue Chinese]: 今天的比利時的部分國土在過去曾是盧森堡的一部分，但在1830年代的比利時革命後成為比利時的一部分。
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Yue Chinese]: 自創辦以來，《洋蔥報》已經成為一個名副其實的新聞模仿帝國，擁有印刷版、10 月份吸引了 500 萬獨立訪問者的網站、個人廣告、24 小時新聞網絡、博客，以及最近推出名為《我們的愚蠢世界》的世界地圖集。
